subject: Re: [PATCH] perf stat: Fix crash on arm64

reviews.author: Ian Rogers
reviews.summary: Reviewer Ian Rogers questioned why the patch was arm64-specific, pointing to legacy metrics being common across architectures and suggesting that the issue might be related to PMU differences.

reviews.author: Leo Yan
reviews.summary: Reviewer Leo Yan reported an issue where the patch does not work on Arm64 platform due to missing CPU type in json, causing perf stat to bail out without output. He provided a fix for his local environment and asked Breno to confirm if this is a different issue from his original problem.

reviews.author: Breno Leitao (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer clarified that the bug is not ARM64-specific and provided a minimal example to reproduce it, but did not explicitly approve or object to the patch.
